bai_incompatible_huds: The value '$VALUE' is not compatible with:
bai_incompatible_huds_option: This option is not compatible with:
bai_default_option:
If you have different HUD installed, this option will default to:
'$VALUE'
bai_language_desc: Changes mod language. To take effect, a level restart is required.
bai_compatibility_desc:
Here you can select a compatibility with certain HUD you are using
Applying wrong HUD compatibility may cause your game to crash

[Autodetect: BAI will try to detect installed HUD]
[Any other option: Forces BAI to load compatibility code for that HUD]
bai_holoui_desc: Apply BAI specific settings to HoloUI
bai_holoui_update_text_color_desc: When updating Assault Banner color also update text color
bai_pdth_hud_reborn_desc: Apply BAI specific settings to PD:TH HUD Reborn
bai_pdth_hud_reborn_custom_text_color_de: When disabled, the game will apply assault icon's color to text
bai_restoration_mod_desc: Apply BAI specific settings to Restoration Mod
bai_restoration_mod_alpha_tape_only_desc: These choices only affects 'Alpha Tape' in Restoration Mod
bai_restoration_mod_include_cover_text_d: Includes 'STAY IN COVER' string in the Assault Box
bai_restoration_mod_use_alpha_assault_te: Uses shorter version of 'POLICE ASSAULT IN PROGRESS' text
bai_restoration_mod_use_alpha_endless_te: Uses shorter version of 'ENDLESS POLICE ASSAULT IN PROGRESS' text
bai_restoration_mod_early_alpha_corner_o: These choices only affects 'Early Alpha Corner' in Restoration Mod
bai_halo_reach_hud_desc: Apply BAI specific settings to Halo: Reach HUD
bai_halo_reach_hud_use_bai_color_desc:
When enabled, assault panel will use colors from BAI
Otherwise default color will be used
bai_detected_wolfhud_desc: WolfHUD's 'Advanced Assault Info' option is not compatible with BAI and has been disabled. That option has been enabled in BAI under names of 'Advanced Assault Info' and 'Assault States'.
bai_detected_vanillahudplus_desc: VanillaHUD's 'Advanced Assault Info' option is not compatible with BAI and has been disabled. That option has been enabled in BAI under names of 'Advanced Assault Info' and 'Assault States'.
bai_detected_assault_states_desc: 'Assault States mod' is incompatible with BAI. BAI has built-in support for assault states. It is recommended to disable or remove 'Assault States mod'.
bai_detected_wave_survived_desc: 'Wave Survived mod' is incompatible with BAI. BAI has built-in support for showing banner with wave survived text. It is recommended to disable or remove 'Wave Survived mod'.
bai_savedata_not_compatible: Savedata not compatible with this BAI version
bai_savedata_not_compatible_desc:
Looks like the inner workings of BAI has changed and made your BAI's saved settings incompatible with this new version of BAI. It's a shame I can't load your savedata, but atleast I loaded default values, so you don't crash.

Sorry for the inconvenience.
bai_show_wave_survived_desc: Shows Wave Survived banner (from Safehouse Raid) every time you and your crew survives police assault
bai_hide_hostage_panel_assault_desc: Hides hostage panel during normal assault
bai_hide_hostage_panel_captain_desc: Hides hostage panel when Captain arrives
bai_hide_hostage_panel_endless_desc: Hides hostage panel during endless assault
bai_completely_hide_hostage_panel_desc:
Hostage Panel will not be visible when you spawn into a mission
This setting ignores 'Hide hostage panel' option in Assault, Captain and Endless box when enabled
bai_show_difficulty_name_instead_of_skul: Show difficulty name instead of skulls

Shows difficulty name instead of skulls in assault box
Not applicable in Crime Spree
bai_captain_box_desc: Changes Assault Box Color (When Captain arrived)
bai_captain_box_mutated_desc: Changes Assault Box Color (When Captain arrived with mutators on)
bai_endless_box_mutated_desc: Changes Endless Assault Box Color (Mutators On)
bai_survived_box_desc: Changes Wave Survived Box Color (Also applies to Wave Survived Banner in Safehouse Raid)
bai_escape_box_desc: Changes Point Of No Return Box Color
bai_color_reset_desc: Reset color to the default value
bai_show_assault_states_desc:
Shows assault state (control, anticipation, build, sustain and fade) in the Assault Box
This option will not work on endless assault and when captain is present
bai_hide_assault_text_desc:
Hides assault text, so you can get assault information faster

Note:
If this option is enabled, normal, faction and custom text will not be shown
This option only works on normal assault
bai_assault_states_desc: Changes state's color and state's visibility in the Assault Box
bai_enabled_not_assault_desc: If checked, it will show in the Assault Box. If not, that state will not be visible in the Assault Box
bai_enabled_assault_desc: If checked, it will show in the Assault Box. If not, the Assault Box will show normal assault instead
bai_show_advanced_assault_info_desc:
Shows 'Spawns Left' and 'Time Left' information in the Assault Box
The info is not available on endless assault and when captain is present
bai_show_time_left_desc:
Shows 'Time Left' in the Assault Box
This option is not accurate when you jump in to a game in progress. But it will get accurate later on
bai_time_format_desc:
Changes Time Format showed with 'Time Left' info

Example:
bai_show_spawns_left_desc:
Shows 'Spawns Left' in the Assault Box
This option is not accurate when you jump in to a game in progress. But it will get accurate later on
bai_spawn_numbers_desc: Defines how spawnes should be calculated
bai_spawn_numbers_1: Show total spawns allowed for an assault
bai_aai_panel_update_rate_desc:
Defines how often the AAI Custom Panel should be updated

Decreasing the value will make updates more often. But it is more demanding on the CPU
Increasing the value will make updates less often and it is less demanding on the CPU

The default value is 0.50, which are 2 updates per second

A level restart is required to take effect
bai_show_captain_panel_desc: Shows Damage Reduction Buff Panel when Captain is present
bai_show_trade_delay_panel_desc: Shows Trade Delay Panel when you kill a civilian
bai_show_trade_delay_panel_when_desc: Defines how the panel should behave in the game
bai_custom_text_faction_desc:
Changes text based on faction

Note:
'Show Faction Name' option must be on
bai_custom_text_input_short_desc: Write your custom text here as short as possible
bai_faction_assault_text_desc:
Shows Faction Name during an assault in the Assault Box
'Custom Text' overrides this feature. Not applicable in Crime Spree
bai_modules_desc:
Modules improve or extend BAI's features
If the module has additional options, they will be listed here
bai_assault_panel_position_desc: Sets Assault Panel Position on the screen
bai_animations_desc: Changes how animations should behave in the game
bai_enable_animations_desc: When disabled, every animation will be instant (default game/hud behavior)
bai_animate_color_change_desc:
Changes how colors should be animated

Enabled:
Color animation is smooth

Disabled:
Color animation is instant
bai_animation_speed_desc: Increasing this value will make the color animation go slower. Decreasing will make it go faster.
hud_assault_endless_gensec_default: ENDLESS GENSEC SWAT ASSAULT IN PROGRESS
hud_assault_endless_zeal_default: ENDLESS ZEAL SWAT ASSAULT IN PROGRESS
hud_assault_endless_zombie_default: ALL MAKES WOLF A DUMB BOY
hud_assault_endless_alpha_halloween: ALL MAKES WOLF A DUMB BOY
